txt.en: 'This is a splendid jam. You have done well! It will spread well on crusty bread, or perhaps I will add it to a dessert. There are always plenty of possibilities to be found for a tasty jam!'
Joyous Jam
Collected grapes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Your stamping feet crush the grapes most effectively
Now is the time to <rgb=#00FF00>dance</rgb> and crush the grapes
The vineyard can be found west of the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should gather some grapes for making jam.
The next step: give the honey jar a shake or two
You have a batch of freshly-crushed grapes ready to be made into jam
The grape tub can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should place the grapes that you have collected into the tub.
Add the crushed grapes to a half-empty honey jar
Perfectly shaken!
The grape tub can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should remove the crushed grapes from the tub.
Gírta can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should bring the jam to Gírta.
TBD
The wash bucket can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should wash your feet before stomping on grapes.
The grape tub can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should stomp on the grapes.
You should shake the jar.
A honey jar can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should add the crushed grapes to the jar.
Collect grapes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Give the jar a good <rgb=#00FF00>shake</rgb>
Place the grapes into the tub at the Beorninghús
Crush the grapes by doing a <rgb=#00FF00>dance</rgb> on them
Stand in the tub
Collect the crushed grapes from the tub
Place the grapes into the tub at the Beorninghús
Bring the jam to Gírta
Add the crushed grapes to a half-empty honey jar
Bring the jam to Gírta
Wash your feet in the wash bucket
For those visiting the Beorninghús, it is important to help in the daily work of Beornings.
Place the grapes into the tub at the Beorninghús
Perhaps a good wash would do before the grapes are crushed
Now it is time to crush the grapes!
Gírta asked you to make jam from scratch: a difficult task, but one which the Beorning matriarch believes you can accomplish. Perhaps it would be best to begin by picking grapes in the orchard.
